# [Interview #67: AOL Chat 1, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=67#25)

#### OMNI Muse

I was at Balticon and I was quite impressed by your Guest of Honor speech and your commitment to literacy.

#### Robert Jordan

Thank you, Muse! :)
